foreignData.name: Einprägen // Erinnern
foreignData.text: Lege einen Zauberspruch oder eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl, die kein Land ist, als zweite Karte von oben in die Bibliothek seines bzw. ihres Besitzers.

foreignData.name: Transferir // Recuerdo
foreignData.text: Pon el hechizo o permanente que no sea tierra objetivo en la biblioteca de su propietario en segundo lugar desde la parte superior.

foreignData.name: Graver // Mémoire
foreignData.text: Mettez le sort ciblé ou le permanent non-terrain ciblé dans la bibliothèque de son propriétaire en deuxième position à partir du dessus.

foreignData.name: Scolpire // Memoria
foreignData.text: Metti una magia o un permanente non terra bersaglio nel grimorio del suo proprietario come seconda carta.

foreignData.name: 暗記 // 記憶
foreignData.text: 呪文１つか土地でないパーマネント１つを対象とし、それをオーナーのライブラリーの一番上から２枚目に置く。

foreignData.name: 헌신 // 기억
foreignData.text: 주문 또는 대지가 아닌 지속물을 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 소유자의 서고 맨 위에서 두 번째에 넣는다.

foreignData.name: Gravar // Memória
foreignData.text: Coloque a mágica ou a permanente alvo que não seja um terreno no grimório do seu dono na segunda posição.

foreignData.name: Сохранить // В Памяти
foreignData.text: Положите целевое заклинание или не являющийся землей перманент в библиотеку его владельца вторым сверху.

foreignData.name: 寄托 // 记忆
foreignData.text: 将目标咒语或非地永久物置于其拥有者的牌库顶数来第二张的位置。

foreignData.name: 寄託 // 記憶
foreignData.text: 將目標咒語或非地永久物置於其擁有者的牌庫頂數來第二張的位置。

Commit // Memory.name: Commit // Memory

rulings.text: If a spell is put into its owner’s library, it’s removed from the stack and thus will not resolve. The spell isn’t countered; it just no longer exists. This works against a spell that can’t be countered.
If a copy of a spell or a token is put into its owner’s library, it’s moved there, then it will cease to exist as a state-based action.

Split cards with aftermath have a new frame treatment—the half you can cast from your hand is oriented the same as other cards you’d cast from your hand, while the half you can cast from your graveyard is a traditional split card half. This frame treatment is for your convenience and has no rules significance.

All split cards have two card faces on a single card, and you put a split card onto the stack with only the half you’re casting. The characteristics of the half of the card you didn’t cast are ignored while the spell is on the stack. For example, if an effect prevents you from casting green spells, you can cast Destined of Destined // Lead, but not Lead.

Each split card is a single card. For example, if you discard one, you’ve discarded one card, not two. If an effect counts the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard, Destined // Lead counts once, not twice.
If the target’s owner’s library contains no cards, the target spell or permanent will be put into that player’s library as the only card.

While not on the stack, the characteristics of a split card are the combination of its two halves. For example, Destined // Lead is a green and black card, it is both an instant card and a sorcery card, and its converted mana cost is 6. This means that if an effect allows you to cast a card with converted mana cost 2 from your hand, you can’t cast Destined. This is a change from the previous rules for split cards.

If you cast the first half of a split card with aftermath during your turn, you’ll have priority immediately after it resolves. You can cast the half with aftermath from your graveyard before any player can take any other action if it’s legal for you to do so.
If another effect allows you to cast a split card with aftermath from any zone other than a graveyard, you can’t cast the half with aftermath.

If another effect allows you to cast a split card with aftermath from a graveyard, you may cast either half. If you cast the half that has aftermath, you’ll exile the card if it would leave the stack.
A spell with aftermath cast from a graveyard will always be exiled afterward, whether it resolves, it’s countered, or it leaves the stack in some other way.
Each split card has two names. If an effect instructs you to choose a card name, you may choose one, but not both.

Once you’ve started to cast a spell with aftermath from your graveyard, the card is immediately moved to the stack. Opponents can’t try to stop the ability by exiling the card with an effect such as that of Crook of Condemnation.

Commit // Memory.text: Put target spell or nonland permanent into its owner's library second from the top.

foreignData.name: Einprägen // Erinnern
foreignData.text:
Nachhall (Wirke diesen Zauberspruch nur aus deinem Friedhof. Schicke ihn danach ins Exil.)
Jeder Spieler mischt die Karten auf seiner Hand und in seinem Friedhof in seine Bibliothek und zieht dann sieben Karten.

foreignData.name: Transferir // Recuerdo
foreignData.text:
Secuela. (Lanza este hechizo solo desde tu cementerio. Luego exílialo.)
Cada jugador baraja su mano y cementerio en su biblioteca, luego roba siete cartas.

foreignData.name: Graver // Mémoire
foreignData.text:
Répercussion (Ne lancez ce sort que depuis votre cimetière. Exilez-le ensuite.)
Chaque joueur mélange sa main et son cimetière avec sa bibliothèque et pioche ensuite sept cartes.

foreignData.name: Scolpire // Memoria
foreignData.text:
Conseguenze (Lancia questa magia solo dal tuo cimitero. Poi esiliala.)
Ogni giocatore rimescola la propria mano e il proprio cimitero nel proprio grimorio, poi pesca sette carte.

foreignData.name: 暗記 // 記憶
foreignData.text:
余波（この呪文はあなたの墓地からのみ唱えられる。その後、これを追放する。）
各プレイヤーはそれぞれ、自分の手札と墓地を自分のライブラリーに加えて切り直し、その後カードを７枚引く。

foreignData.name: 헌신 // 기억
foreignData.text:
여파 (당신의 무덤에서만 이 주문을 발동할 수 있다. 그 후, 이 카드를 추방한다.)
각 플레이어는 자신의 손과 무덤을 서고에 섞어 넣은 후 카드 일곱 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.name: Gravar // Memória
foreignData.text:
Consequências (Conjure esta mágica somente de seu cemitério. Depois, exile-a.)
Cada jogador embaralha a própria mão e cemitério em seu próprio grimório e depois compra sete cards.

foreignData.name: Сохранить // В Памяти
foreignData.text:
Последствия (Разыгрывайте это заклинание только из вашего кладбища. Затем изгоните его.)
Каждый игрок втасовывает свои руку и кладбище в свою библиотеку, затем берет семь карт.

foreignData.name: 寄托 // 记忆
foreignData.text:
余响（此咒语只能从你的坟墓场中施放。然后将它放逐。）
每位牌手将其手牌与坟墓场洗入其牌库，然后各抓七张牌。

foreignData.name: 寄託 // 記憶
foreignData.text:
餘響（此咒語只能從你的墳墓場中施放。然後將它放逐。）
每位玩家將其手牌與墳墓場洗入其牌庫，然後各抽七張牌。

Commit // Memory.text:
Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.)
Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards.
